name: Target Moon
description:
Target Moon

You can check out my other games -> Tower of Power, Seniorb, ZipZip

How To Play

You are on a spaceship and the goal is to reach moon, you have to repair damages to maintain your speed, if the damage is out of the spaceship, you have to get out of it to repair. But your oxygen is limited so you have limited time to repair it. Also you have to shoot incoming asteroids(there is a notification when an asteroid appear) to avoid it crashing the ship.If it crashes, ship will get damage.

Controls

Rotate -> A-D or arrow keys

Jetpack -> W or Up arrow

1  -> Get Wrench ( To repair damages)

E -> Repair Damage ( You have to hold wrench and be near damage)

2 -> Get Gun ( To shoot asteroids)

Space -> Shoot ( You have to hold gun)

Mouse Wheel -> Zoom in-out

Wheel Button -> Reset Zoom
